messages.subject: ~Intro~
messages.msgSnippet: Hi, All~ Wanted to do an actual intro. Our names are Debbie and Shane (5 1/2). I ve been lurking for a few weeks and am so grateful to have found this group. I
messages.messageBody:
Hi, All~ Wanted to do an actual intro. Our names are Debbie and Shane (5
1/2). I've been lurking for a few weeks and am so grateful to have found this
group. I also recently joined the alwayslearning group and really appreciate the
keeping it real, saying what you feel tone of both groups. I'm so grateful for
the inspiration and to find there are others like us out there. I feel we've
been homeschooling Shane's whole life through a natural learning process...he
takes the lead and I do my best to support whatever he's into. We experience
life as if it is our playground to explore and experiment with.

I am a single, stay-at-home mom and an editor and, recently, a writer. We
have four dogs, two cats and two fish..plus the butterflies (for now).

Sparkles~
Debbie & Shane




[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
